Susan Sirma (amụrụ na onwa Mee 26, na afọ 1966) bụ onye Kenya na-agba ọsọ n'etiti etiti nke lara ezumike nká nke a maara nke ọma maka inweta ọla nchara karịa mita 3000 na afo 1991 World Championships, na-aghọ nwanyị ojii Africa mbụ meriri nrite track na field na World Championship ma ọ bụ Olympic.
Sirma nwetakwara ihe nrite ọla edo abụọ n'ebe a na All-Africa Games, n'ezie naanị oge e mere mita 3000 na egwuregwu ahụ
N'afọ 1991, ọ merikwara 1500 mita, ihe ndekọ mmeri ya ka dị.
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Singore Girls na Iten
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ kwagara ebe obibi ya na Japan. Ndị na-agba ọsọ ibe a mụrụ na Kenya Sally Barsosio na Lornah Kiplagat bụ ụmụ nwanne nne ya.
